news_header: Dogs and their owners attended a special film screening in Paris.
news_text: In Paris, 18 dogs and their owners gathered at the Majestic Bastille cinema for a special showing of a classic Walt Disney animated film from 1955. After some initial sniffing and barking, the dogs settled on red benches to enjoy the movie. Owners expressed joy at sharing this experience with their pets. Following the success of this event, the cinema director plans to host more dog-friendly screenings in the future.
